name: EvoSouls - DEMO
description:
EvoSouls a souls-like were your playstyle changes your abilities to become stronger and better suited to you. currently there is no full version of the game but if you enjoy please spread the word so I can finish the game someday.

also note this is a very early version of the game and currently a few assets are temporary and any glitches found will not be present in a final release
